desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.jp: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.thai: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.ko: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.zh_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校對策委員會社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.thai: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.ko: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
desc.zh_tw: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.thai: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.ko: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.zh_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.zh_tw: 将老师背到對策委員會办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏萊老师的身份。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 将老师背到对策委员会办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏莱老师的身份。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.

desc.ko: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
